LanguageData.HeavyBridges.label: heavy bridges
LanguageData.HeavyBridges.description: Build heavy bridges to provide passage over water and even construct heavy structures on them.
LanguageData.DeepWaterBridges.label: deep water bridges
LanguageData.DeepWaterBridges.description: Learn how to build large pillar structures for your bridges to be able to build bridges even on deep water.
